mapper.select: SELECT T1.MBR_NO, T1.GRP_NO, T1.MBR_ID, T1.MBR_NM, T1.MBR_NKNM, T1.MBR_PSWD, T1.MBR_SOGM, T1.MBR_TYPE_CD, T1.MBR_LVL, T1.MBR_CLR_CD, T1.UP_MBR_NO, T1.SIGNUP_CD, T1.CUR_CD, T1.EXCN_BANK_NM, T1.EXCN_ACT_NO, T1.EXCN_DPSTR_NM, T1.EXCN_PSWD, T1.PHONE_NO, T1.SIGNUP_DOMAIN, T1.CRT_DT, T1.MDF_DT, T1.DEL_DT, T1.PSN_MONY, T1.PSN_POINT, T1.UNRGST_YN, T1.DEL_YN, T1.LAST_LGIN_DT, T1.LAST_BETG_DT, T1.LAST_CNTN_IP, T1.LAST_CNTN_DOMAIN, T1.LAST_GAME_NO, FROM MBR_MST T1 ORDER BY T1.CRT_DT DESC
